overall.description: Build a matrix object from a string, nested sequence, or array.

obj.description: Input data. If a string, variables in the current scope may be referenced by name.

ldict.description: A dictionary that replaces local operands in current frame. Ignored if obj is not a string or gdict is None.

gdict.description: A dictionary that replaces global operands in current frame. Ignored if obj is not a string.

out.description: Returns a matrix object, which is a specialized 2-D array.

note: All the following expressions construct the same block matrix: '
